title: Standard Subscription
description: Strengthen your Forex trading skills and save time.
benefits: Global access to courses taught by recognized Forex traders.
Access to all Forex trading courses you wish to follow or explore.

title: Premium Subscription
description: The next level learning package for Forex trading.
benefits: Global access to selected Forex trading courses.
Access to all Forex trading courses you wish to follow or explore.
